answers.value:
{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","methodDescription":"Standard procedure for working aloft / Overside","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Slipping and falling from height","existingMeasures":"1. Comply with PPE matrix.
2. Surface of working area shall be clear of salt deposit and ice in cold weather.
3. Supervision by Senior personnel at all times.
4. Establish communication between Deck and BW.
5. Work area to be well illuminated for the task.
6. Use anti skid walkway in work areas and its surrounding.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Equipment failure","existingMeasures":"1. Condition of all the equipment used for working aloft are proper and maintained well.
2. Suitable size and load of harness selected for the task performer.
3. Identify strong and suitable securing points for harness.
4. Stop work when found abnormalities during operation.","additionalMeasures":"1. Carry out routine inspection and test of all the equipment used for working aloft.
2. Use safety net if applicable.","likelihood":4,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":2},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Weather and sea hazard","existingMeasures":"1. Obtain weather forecast and arrange work in acceptable weather condition.
2. Weather and sea conditions to be monitored throughout the task.
3. No working overside while underway except for preparation for pilot embarkation/disembarkation.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Accident to personnel","existingMeasures":"1. Comply with PPE matrix.
2. Avoid selecting acrophobic crew to task related to height and hanging overside.
3. Cordon and barricare areas under working aloft areas.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Working tools falling down","existingMeasures":"1. Transfer tools to Task Performer using appropriate means (tool bag or bucket with attached line).
2. Ensure areas under working aloft location were cordoned off and barricared.
3. Comply with PPE matrix.","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":null,"consequence":null,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null}]}
